titleStmt.title: The declaration of His Highness the Prince of Orange concerning papists not departing from the cities of London and Westminster, and ten miles adjacent.
titleStmt.author: William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
William III, King of England, 1650-1702.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1689-1694 : William and Mary)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J. Starkey and A. and W. Churchill,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
At end of text: Given at St. James's the fourteenth day of January, 1688.
